Text: Anyone noticing really loud background noise?
The sound on this is terrible. So much background noise, the music is often so loud you can't hear the dialogue, and the dialogue itself fades in and out. Would not have expected this from eztv.
really bad sound ... what are all those crows on the soundtrack?
